affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
HERO STUN DURATION: 1 / 1 / 1 / 1
CREEP STUN DURATION: 5 / 5 / 5 / 5
HERO DAMAGE: 50 / 50 / 50 / 50
BOUNCES: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8
cmb:
MANA COST: 110/120/130/140
COOLDOWN: 20/18/16/14
desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
name: witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask

attrib:
MANA PER SEC: 8 / 12 / 16 / 20
RADIUS: 500
HEAL: 16 / 24 / 32 / 40
cmb:
MANA COST: 20/30/40/50
COOLDOWN: 0
desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.
notes:
Healing is done in 0.33 second intervals.
Can heal magic immune units.
lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
name: witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration

cmb:
MANA COST: 120/120/120/120
COOLDOWN: 20
desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
notes: Damage is based on the difference between the HP values currently and when Maledict was cast.
lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
name: witch_doctor_maledict

cmb:
MANA COST: 200/200/200
COOLDOWN: 80
desc:
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes. The Death Ward has attack range of 700, and attacks every 0.22 seconds. Level 3 Death Ward bounces once. Lasts 8 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
name: witch_doctor_death_ward
